definitions.definition: Having a chemical nature that is harmful to health or lethal if consumed or otherwise entering into the body in sufficient quantities.
examples: Tobacco smoke contains many toxic substances.

definitions.definition: Appearing grossly unwell ; characterised by serious , potentially life-threatening compromise in the respiratory , circulatory or other body systems.
examples: The child appeared toxic on arrival at the hospital.
a toxic environment that promoted bullying
It is not good to be around toxic people.

main_definition: ( toxicology , pharmacology ) Having a chemical nature that is harmful to health or lethal if consumed or otherwise entering into the body in sufficient quantities.
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) Appearing grossly unwell ; characterised by serious , potentially life-threatening compromise in the respiratory , circulatory or other body systems.
( figurative , of a person ) Hateful or strongly antipathetic .
